links.title: Burcon: Tax Loss Turnaround Stock Like GLBR With Potential Cannabis Deal At Play
links.description: As every year ends, stocks that have done poorly get sold down even more as investors sell their losers in time to be eligible for a tax loss credit against their winners. These stocks tend to reverse from their oversold condition in January.
